resources.string: VITwale is an initiative by the students of VIT. It aims to provide a common platform for getting updated regarding each and every extra-curricular activities of VIT. Let it be information about any club, chapter, team or NGO; or it may be information about the upcoming events, you will find all your answers here in a single website. Since class-announcements have been suspended in VIT, publicizing events and gathering crowd has been a big trouble for everyone. VITwale would provide free service in publicizing events and other happenings of VIT so that none of the potential crowd should be left out.
